title: Modern Home Adjustable Barstool Chrome Gas Lift - Standard
description: Our universal rotating barstool gas lift fits most modern bar stools that adjust in height. With a diameter of 1 7/8", we offer 2 options in length. The smaller size (STANDARD) is for most barstools and adjusts in height from 20" - 28". The longer gas lift is used in most bar tables and adjusts from 24 1/4" - 33 1/4" in height. We also offer the longer gas lift with a non-rotation option that enables you to raise your stool or table up and down but locks in place to avoid rotation. Each lift is tested to 100,000 operations and comes with a 5 year warranty. This listing is for the standard barstool gas lift.
